animeDescription:
Mimi Kitagami is a kind, level-headed girl who aims to be the best, coolest student council president of her high school class. However, three trouble-making boys are always causing her grief â€” and she has a one-sided crush on one of the boys, Ushio Toujou.

(Source: ANN)
